title: Paul Manafort Shares Trump Campaign Data with Russian Agent Konstantin Kilimnik
summary: Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort shares internal polling data with Russian intelligence agent Konstantin Kilimnik for Ukrainian oligarchs when Trump clinches nomination

sources.title: Manafort shared Trump campaign polling data with Russian associate
Senate Report Volume 5 - Manafort and Kilimnik

notes: Senate found Kilimnik was Russian intelligence officer. Data included internal polling from key swing states. Used to target disinformation. Manafort owed millions to Russian oligarch Deripaska.
